articles.title: Asian shares fall again, dollar drifts By Reuters - Investing.com
articles.description: Asian shares fall again, dollar drifts
articles.content:
By Alun John
HONG KONG (Reuters) - Asian shares gave up early gains to fall again on Thursday, weighed by declines in China and Hong Kong, even after a strong lead-in from Wall Street which had also… [+2605 chars]
